data.actual_result: is accepted and ends up looking like the following - http://i.imgur.com/yUEE8dJ.png
data.expected_result: nicknames, server names, and usernames are denied becuase of use of this character (like zwsp names are)
data.short_description: User can add whitespace as a name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the character in between the accents `ᅟ` (supposed character http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/115f/index.htm) - Paste an near unlimited time in username or nickname or server name
